title: Mutation-based mechanism and evolution of the potent multidrug efflux pump RE-CmeABC in
authors: Dai L, Wu Z, Sahin O, Zhao S, Yu EW, Zhang Q
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
abstract: The resistance-nodulation-cell division (RND) superfamily of multidrug efflux systems are important players in mediating antibiotic resistance in gram-negative pathogens.
